OOC: This is going to be interesting... our posts have to be essentially 
simultaneous for the first shot.

::Kaiser::
       He nods his assent and aims slightly over Perceptor's head.  "Three!"  
He launches himself onto his back expecting a shot and fires his now lowered 
weapon at Perceptor's torso.

--part1_185.16cdbdbd.2b7c0a5f_boundary
